alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:34PM CDT until May 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR DICKINSON...SOUTHEASTERN OTTAWA AND SOUTHERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 1033 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Longford to 4 miles south of Carlton to 7 miles northwest of Mcpherson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Herington, Chapman, Solomon, Enterprise, Hope, Woodbine, Manchester, Longford, Carlton, Moonlight and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 289. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
